edu.msu.cme.rdp.classifier.rrnaclassifier
Class LogWordPriorFileParser

java.lang.Object
  edu.msu.cme.rdp.classifier.rrnaclassifier.LogWordPriorFileParser
class LogWordPriorFileParser
extends java.lang.Object

A parser to parse a read containing a list of the indices of words and the log value of word prior probabilities.

Method Detail

createLogWordPriorArr

HierarchyVersion createLogWordPriorArr(java.io.Reader r,
                                       float[] arr,
                                       HierarchyVersion version)
                                 throws java.io.IOException,
                                        TrainingDataException
Reads a file and saves the log word priors in an array. Returns the version information for validation purpose. Input file format: integer follows by a tab and float each line. The first value indicates the index of a word, the second value indicates the log value of word prior probability.

Throws:
java.io.IOException
TrainingDataException
